text: The 2004 Rally Australia (formally the 17th Telstra Rally Australia) was the sixteenth and final round of the 2004 World Rally Championship. The race was held over four days between 11 November and 14 November 2004, and was based in Perth, Australia. Citroën's Sébastien Loeb won the race, his 10th win in the World Rally Championship. == Entry list == 1 Petter Solberg. 2 Mikko Hirvonen. 3 Sébastian Loeb. 4 Carlos Sainz. 5 Marcus Grönholm. 6 Harri Rovanperä. 7 Markko Martin. 8 Francois Duval. == Results == == References == == External links == * Official website of the World Rally Championship * 2004 Australia Rally at Rallye-info Australia Category:Rally Australia Rally
title: 2004 Rally Australia
